sourceMeaningMnemonic: A giant <radical>cross</radical> with a <radical>mouth</radical> stands above you. "I am <kanji>reason</kanji>!" it says to you. It is the Cross of Reason.
meaningInfo: Because it's a cross with a mouth, it thinks that it is reason in all the chaos.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>reason</kanji> that this Cross of Reason exists is to combat the <reading>you</reading>ths (<ja>ゆう</ja>) of the world, who just bring chaos into everything.
readingInfo: "Those youths just do things for no reason! That's why I, the Cross of Reason, am here! I will knock some reason into those youths."
